name: Christmas Nightmare (dillionaire)
description:
It's Christmas Eve and tragedy has struck! A mysterious force has knocked Santa out of the sky and sent the last child's presents flying everywhere. As his trusty elf it is up to you to save Christmas. Avoid the evil elves and don't freeze to death. Warm up near a fire when you get too cold. Locate presents by listening to your special Elf senses. Collect them and return to the child's home before he wakes up.

Controls:

Move - W, A, S, D

Throw Present - Left Mouse Button

Quit Game - P, Esc

Attributions:

Snow particle system:
Based on Snowfall from Scratch by Zap Spider

Log:
Cherry Logs by edikm1
https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/free-3ds-model-cherry-logs/644464
